I am Omotola Ayodele Lawal — a Medical Doctor turned aspiring Data & AI Engineer. With a solid foundation in data science, I specialize in data wrangling, exploratory analysis, and transforming complex datasets into actionable insights. Through programs like ALX, DataCamp, Codebasics and hands-on projects, I’m bridging healthcare and technology to solve real-world problems with Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerBI, Python, R, SQL and machine learning. My medical background gives me a unique edge in interpreting health data deeply and applying advanced analytics to drive smarter, impact-driven decisions.
